mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.grade AS "grade", a.path AS "path", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.create_id AS "createId"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO org_qualification( name, grade, path, org_id, create_time, create_id ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{grade}, #{path}, #{orgId}, #{createTime}, #{createId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE org_qualification SET name = #{name}, grade = #{grade}, path = #{path}, org_id = #{orgId}, create_time = #{createTime}, create_id = #{createId} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM org_qualification a WHERE a.org_id = #{orgId}
